data.eml:eml: Ateuchus cujuchi n. sp., a new inquiline species of Scarabaeinae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) from tuco-tuco burrows in Bolivia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Génier, François (2015): Ateuchus cujuchi n. sp., a new inquiline species of Scarabaeinae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) from tuco-tuco burrows in Bolivia. Zootaxa 3946 (1): 146-148, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3946.1.9
